title: Encyclopedia galactica. The inner solar system
brief_description: New computer graphics and recently released pictures of the cosmos show a journey through the nine planets of the solar sytem, the birth if the sun, the hole in the ozone layer over the South Pole, how the moon was born, and Mercury and Venus, the two hottest planets nearest the sun.
